resources.string: Does this question has accepted answer: Yes

I am try to send DM user to user with discord.py. And not Bot to User DM.
@client.event
async def on_ready():
 print("The bot is ready")
 print("------------------------")
 user = await client.fetch_user(User_id)
 await user.send("Hello there!")


this code send bot to user dm but i want to send user to user DM only
"
